title: Counterparty Credit Check
description: Before executing a long-term PPA, a risk analyst must perform a credit check on the potential corporate off-taker.

tasks.description: Retrieve the potential counterparty's public credit rating from major agencies (S&P, Moody's).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fetches the credit ratings and finds they are investment grade.

tasks.description: Analyze the counterparty's recent financial statements (income statement, balance sheet) to assess financial health.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes key financial ratios like debt-to-equity and current ratio.

tasks.description: Assign an internal credit risk score and recommend a maximum unsecured credit limit for the counterparty.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a risk score and a justified credit limit.
